badge.andromeda.description: The chained princess offers you her nine shining stars.
badge.andromeda.name: Andromeda
badge.aquarius.description: The Water Bearer flows with eleven stars into your collection.
badge.aquarius.name: Aquarius
badge.cassiopeia.description: The five stars of the Queen’s throne are now yours!
badge.cassiopeia.name: Cassiopeia
badge.cygnus.description: You’ve soared through the Swan and earned its seven stars!
badge.cygnus.name: Cygnus
badge.gemini.description: Twins unite! You’ve earned the two brightest stars of Gemini.
badge.gemini.name: Gemini
badge.hydra.description: The serpent’s head has gifted you its twelve stars!
badge.hydra.name: Hydra
badge.leo.description: The Lion roars with its ten stars in your grasp!
badge.leo.name: Leo
badge.lyra.description: You’ve strummed the strings of the Lyre, earning its six stars!
badge.lyra.name: Lyra
badge.orion.description: You’ve earned the bright stars of the Hunter’s Belt and Sword!
badge.orion.name: Orion
badge.pegasus.description: You’ve galloped across the sky with Pegasus’s fourteen stars!
badge.pegasus.name: Pegasus
badge.scorpius.description: You’ve captured the thirteen stars of the Scorpion!
badge.scorpius.name: Scorpius
